application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Condition 8 (Contamination) of planning permission ref. 27354/APP/2021/1291, dated 04-08-2021 (Erection of a three storey building comprising a dental surgery and 6 residential units (3 x 1-bed units, 1 x 3-bed unit and 2 x 2-bed units), car and cycle parking and associated works, temporary permission for the siting of a modular building to the rear of the site for use as a dental surgery during the demolition of the existing dental surgery and construction of the proposed dental surgery)
decision_conditions: This application permits the discharge of Condition 8 (Contamination) of planning permission ref. 27354/APP/2021/1291, dated 04-08-2021, on the basis of the information submitted. If the information is not correct and accurate, please be advised that this will invalidate the permission granted.
